1.79462e-307/1.79481e-307 + 1.867e-200/8.00859e-307 = 0/0 = nan
1.79462e-307/1.79481e-307 - 1.867e-200/8.00859e-307 = -0/0 = nan
1.79462e-307/1.79481e-307 * 1.867e-200/8.00859e-307 = 0/0 = nan
1.79462e-307/1.79481e-307 : 1.867e-200/8.00859e-307 = 0/0 = nan
1/2 + 3/4 = 10/8 = 1.25
1/2 - 3/4 = -2/8 = -0.25
1/2 * 3/4 = 3/8 = 0.375
1/2 : 3/4 = 4/6 = 0.666667
1/2+3/4=10/8=1.25
1/2-3/4=-2/8=-0.25
1/2*3/4=3/8=0.375
1/2:3/4=4/6=0.666667
